title: GlossaryTerm
description: This schema defines the Glossary term entities.

name.description: Name that identifies a glossary term.
Name that identifies the source of an external glossary term. Example `HealthCare.gov`

endpoint.description: Name that identifies the source of an external glossary term. Example `HealthCare.gov`

id.description: Unique identifier of a glossary term instance.

name.description: Preferred name for the glossary term.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this glossary.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a glossary term. It captures name hierarchy of glossary of terms in the form of `glossaryName.parentTerm.childTerm`.

synonyms.description: Alternate names that are synonyms or near-synonyms for the glossary term.

glossary.description: Glosary that this term belongs to.

parent.description: Parent glossary term that this term is child of. When `null` this term is the root term of the glossary.

children.description: Other glossary terms that are children of this glossary term.

relatedTerms.description: Other glossary terms that are related to this glossary term.

references.description: Link to a reference from an external glossary.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

reviewers.description: User names of the reviewers for this glossary.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
